name: LilTimtim's Strange Night
description:
In this game you play the role of Lil Timtim. Help him get back to bed, and maybe get some food on the way.

This is a text only choose your own adventure, with the Look, Move, Action, Inventory, control scheme, a few endings, and what I think is an interesting little story.

If you want to keep track of all the endings, I suggest notepad, or an actual notepad.

Well, here ya go.

-zubb
